title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
description: When attempting to open the group dialog, it is not displayed when the dataset is not set.
OB: An error is shown when trying to open the group dialog.
EB: The group dialog should be shown regardless of whether the dataset is set or not.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the application. 
2. Open the group dialog. 
Expected behavior: The group dialog should be displayed even if no dataset is set.
